Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Prohibits the formation of a subsidiary of a public authority without prior approval of the legislature
Summary: Prohibits the formation of a subsidiary of a public authority without prior approval of the legislature; allows the formation of a subsidiary of a public authority without prior approval of the legislature if such public authority files a written notice sixty days prior to the organization of such subsidiary with the governor and the legislature.
LawCode: Amd ยง2827-a, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to prohibiting the formation of a subsidiary of a public authority without prior permission of the legislature
